verses.verse: "In that day <S%H3117><s%> a fountain <S%H4726><s%> will be opened <S%H6605><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> and for the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> for sin <S%H9128><s%> and for impurity. <S%H5079><s%>

"And it will come <S%H1961><s%> about in that day, <S%H3117><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> "that I will cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> the names <S%H8034><s%> of the idols <S%H6091><s%> from the land, <S%H776><s%> and they will no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> be remembered; <S%H2142><s%> and I will also <S%H1571><s%> remove <S%H5674><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%> and the unclean <S%H2932><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> from the land. <S%H776><s%>

"And it will come <S%H1961><s%> about that if <S%H3588><s%> anyone <S%H376><s%> still <S%H5750><s%> prophesies, <S%H5012><s%> then his father and mother <S%H1><s%> who gave <S%H517><s%> birth <S%H3205><s%> to him will say <S%H3205><s%> to him, 'You shall not live, <S%H559><s%> for you have spoken <S%H2421><s%> falsely <S%H1696><s%> in the name <S%H8267><s%> of the Lord <S%H8034><s%>'; and his father and mother <S%H3068><s%> who gave <S%H1><s%> birth <S%H517><s%> to him will pierce <S%H3205><s%> him through <S%H3205><s%> when he prophesies. <S%H1856><s%>

"Also it will come <S%H1961><s%> about in that day <S%H3117><s%> that the prophets <S%H5030><s%> will each <S%H376><s%> be ashamed <S%H954><s%> of his vision <S%H2384><s%> when he prophesies, <S%H5012><s%> and they will not put <S%H3847><s%> on a hairy <S%H8181><s%> robe <S%H155><s%> in order <S%H4616><s%> to deceive; <S%H3584><s%>

but he will say, <S%H559><s%> 'I am not a prophet; <S%H5030><s%> I am a tiller <S%H376><s%> <S%H5647><s%> of the ground, <S%H127><s%> for a man <S%H120><s%> sold <S%H7069><s%> me as a slave in my youth. <S%H5271><s%>'

"And one will say <S%H559><s%> to him, 'What <S%H4100><s%> are these <S%H428><s%> wounds <S%H4347><s%> between <S%H996><s%> your arms <S%H3027><s%>?' Then he will say, <S%H559><s%> '[Those] with which <S%H834><s%> I was wounded <S%H5221><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of my friends. <S%H157><s%>'

"Awake, <S%H5782><s%> O sword, <S%H2719><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> My Shepherd, <S%H7462><s%> And against <S%H5921><s%> the man, <S%H1397><s%> My Associate, <S%H5997><s%>" Declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts. <S%H6635><s%> "Strike <S%H5221><s%> the Shepherd <S%H7462><s%> that the sheep <S%H6629><s%> may be scattered; <S%H6327><s%> And I will turn <S%H7725><s%> My hand <S%H3027><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the little <S%H6819><s%> ones.

"And it will come <S%H1961><s%> about in all <S%H3605><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%>" Declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "That two <S%H8147><s%> parts <S%H6310><s%> in it will be cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> [and] perish; <S%H1478><s%> But the third <S%H7992><s%> will be left <S%H3498><s%> in it.

"And I will bring <S%H935><s%> the third <S%H7992><s%> part <S%H7992><s%> through the fire, <S%H784><s%> Refine <S%H6884><s%> them as silver <S%H3701><s%> is refined, <S%H6884><s%> And test <S%H974><s%> them as gold <S%H2091><s%> is tested. <S%H974><s%> They will call <S%H7121><s%> on My name, <S%H8034><s%> And I will answer <S%H6030><s%> them; I will say, <S%H559><s%> 'They are My people, <S%H5971><s%>' And they will say, <S%H559><s%> 'The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is my God. <S%H430><s%>'"
